overview: Fresh out of college, a young man lazes about his family's estate, which irritates his father, a self-made millionaire who hatches a bankruptcy plan that he hopes will inspire his son to get a job.
tagline: Dad's a self-made millionaire. His son just has it made. Now Dad's about to give it all away to get his son to make his own.
title: For Richer, for Poorer
